original_title: Shred: The Story of Asher Bradshaw
overview: "SHReD' is the inspiring story of 6 year old skateboarding prodigy and viral YouTube sensation Asher Bradshaw, and his father's struggle to make his son's dream of becoming one of the youngest sponsored skaters ever come true. Come and join us as we follow Asher on the ride of his life!"
title: Shred: The Story of Asher Bradshaw
